https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ejYslOKoRQdD3WWKqYEabwvPlSV.jpg Two guys find a beautiful young woman to take the place of their missing roommate. Everything seems fine until a horrible mistake on drunken night leads all three on a downward spiral. Bad Roomies
